html:
9.28.20  1:08 pm   is ball&stick a statement about the state?

      no

9.28.20  1:07 pm   I keep second guessing my decisions, one day i want to do this, the next i want to do that, and with people that have the same skill level as i do already start doing cool things while i can't stick to one, how can i solve this?

      ah, you must complete the 12 levels of suffering, then the 13th which is the unlucky last and final level; the reason it is unlucky is because after you finish it you will be informed that there is another level after that

9.28.20  1:05 pm   wait... so what are you working on, your confusing

      it's one of those songs where it has a music video also, to go along with the song. released as a video, and also as just the song so you can listen to it on-the-go if you prefer

9.28.20  12:46 pm   how do i stop procrastinating

      you don't have to permanently stop, just take a break from it and finish it later

9.28.20  11:48 am   should there be a deadline before a deadline so as to speed things up?

      yes

9.28.20  11:15 am   When is the movie "Triangle Boy The Movie" going to be in theaters?

      what the heck is a theater

9.28.20  11:01 am   how to start learning music theory?

      start by learning music

9.28.20  10:52 am   how do you deal with life?

      picture a tree in a field

9.28.20  10:51 am   do you have a favorite vegetable 

      a fully fledged vegetable. the fledgetable

9.28.20  10:26 am   does the title of your new song has the word "rage" in it?

      no

9.28.20  10:05 am   When you read a question, how long does it take for you to think of an answer?

      that depends on whether the question has stirred a deep conflict within my soul

9.28.20  9:45 am   best kind of soup?

      goup

9.28.20  9:04 am   What is one of your craziest but most reasonable theories?

      you know that feeling when you're watching a movie/film (like the kind you would see in the cinema back when that was a thing), and you're watching it for the first time, and you're 20 minutes into it and you still have no idea what the heck is supposed to be going on?... and not in a good way, but you just feel lost and confused and left out? My theory is that this is often a sign that the writer has made a plot outline/plan before they actually wrote the script, and so they have lost touch with how little the viewer knows

9.28.20  7:49 am   what inspired you to make "no castle?"

      must have been the simplicity police. i should clarify: that would be for the audio recording, which was made in 2010. the video, which was not made until around 2014, was inspired by the challenge of making a music video for a song with no lyrics

9.28.20  7:17 am   whats your favorite word?

      horsey

9.28.20  6:20 am   what should i be for halloween

      how about a horsey

9.28.20  4:27 am   are you a banana

      no but i am the next best thing

9.28.20  3:21 am   what do you do when you feel down?

      start my own tv show

9.28.20  2:03 am   an idea: in your new video, or perhaps a future video, intentionally leave in a detail that you don't actually like and see if we can spot it.

      i've been doing that all my life, except instead of 1 detail it's 1 trillion details

9.28.20  2:02 am   would you be willing to post a cropped screenshot of the video you're working on?

      screenshots of the video don't look any good yet. has to move

9.28.20  1:43 am   how do you spell

      if you want to totally obliterate your opponents, use all the same letter

9.28.20  1:37 am   Do you have a favorite animal?

      what's the one with the opinions

9.28.20  12:49 am   where do i start to learn about mixing and mastering songs?

      just listen to your song, and see if it sucks, and if it does, how the heck do you think you can change it. start by adjusting the volume, then if that doesn't work, listen to some other songs in a rage of panic and despair for a while, until you think of what else you might be able to try. eventually someone else will ask you how you do it so good, even though you still don't think you've figured it out yet

9.28.20  12:37 am   i am a perfectionist and i can't handle it, it's not just my work and music and stuff, it's everything has to be perfect or else something disastrous will occur. how to distract myself from thinking this way? 

      in what world is it even possible for something to be perfect

9.28.20  12:31 am   Is your next song not named yet?

      it is named but i have 2 different variations depending on how much courage i have at the time of publication

9.28.20  12:24 am   How important music theory is for you in the music making process of the songs you have written?

      the best thing about 'music theory' is that it literally changes with every passing moment as you live your life. how to make music? no person on earth knows for sure. and yet despite that, somehow, the music knows us

9.28.20  12:17 am   how do you like to celebrate halloween?

      make a lot of songs and other types of videos, and more

9.28.20  12:07 am   Are you hoping to release the song and video at the same time?

     yes, that is extremely important to me

     Or will you post the song on Spotify, Soundcloud, your website first? I suppose you probably would have already done that, if that was your plan, right?

9.27.20  11:52 pm   do you think the government secretly controls us thanks to apples?!

      no

9.27.20  11:45 pm   Is music overrated? 

      unratable

9.27.20  11:43 pm   Will you add the improv footage from your videos page and reality vids, and possibly more improv stuff, to your improv page?

      of course

9.27.20  11:18 pm   in your words, "before you know it, it'll be TUESDAY..." do with that information what you will

      i know what you mean

9.27.20  11:05 pm   do you know what's going on because i want to know 

      it always changes so the best thing i can do is try to show you some examples and depictions of that change

9.27.20  10:27 pm   What is your favorite word

      whichever one i am currently saying

9.27.20  10:08 pm   who invented fun?

      you might have to do it

9.27.20  9:01 pm   will the video you're working on come out soon?

      yes

9.27.20  8:57 pm   what is your favorite verb

      set

9.27.20  7:49 pm   What are you learning right now?

      how to be normal and do very normal stuff

9.27.20  7:03 pm   How to I make my music not sound like dog shit 

      always keep a recording of dog shit near by, so you can compare it for reference

9.27.20  6:23 pm   are you secretly a funny carrot?

      i either don't know or can't tell you

9.27.20  6:11 pm   how is love everywhere and nowhere at the same time

      by the miracle of quantum mechanics

9.27.20  6:07 pm   how much is everything

      everything is everything

9.27.20  5:54 pm   not to be all in-your-face or unfriendly but how many songs and videos have you made (not really recently but just throughout your life, some of which you've released on other platforms) that you have still not posted to this website? and can you get to posting them?

      the unposted material is difficult to quantify because it would typically be incomplete in some type of way. but i continue to make sense of it and release it, over time

9.27.20  5:38 pm   secret to happiness?

      being unhappy for at least some of the time

9.27.20  5:36 pm   i have many random melodies for things but i don't know what to do with them to make them into full things. what should i do?

      add them to a list. one day when you figure out how to use them, you will be glad you have them

9.27.20  4:35 pm   is there any logic in the existence of giraffes?

      yes but i don't know what it is

9.27.20  4:02 pm   What inspired you to create music?

      it's just a free and easy super power

9.27.20  3:49 pm   how do i not get underwears for christmas just like i did last year?

      put an update video on YouTube, explaining that you will not accept any more underwear after the 20th of october

9.27.20  3:48 pm   have you ever done programming

      yes

9.27.20  3:45 pm   has anyone walked in on you when you are saying some random nonsense for a video?

      no
